snippet: Magnus Carlsen took the title at the Shamkir 2014 tournament in a last-round victory over Fabiano Caruana, who had bested him earlier in the event.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column; Magnus Carlsen takes title at the Shamkir 2014 tournament in Azerbaijan in a last-round victory over Fabiano Caruana, who had bested him earlier in the event.
lead_paragraph: Magnus Carlsen took the title at the Shamkir 2014 tournament in a last-round victory over Fabiano Caruana, who had bested him earlier in the event.

headline.print_headline: In Azerbaijan, Carlsen Wins When It Counts
headline.main: In Azerbaijan, Carlsen Wins When It Counts
